lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we jump into tonight's game, we have some quick announcements to get over, but welcome regardless.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To get over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get over the announcements, you know, to make it work. First and foremost, we have our fantastic returning sponsor for tonight, our friends for this campaign, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: D&D Beyond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've been awesome and, Sam, you have a few things to say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody from Wrigleyville to Lincoln Park is talking about the D&D Beyond. Whether you're checking out the Bean, riding the Red Line, or getting a pop at a Blackhawks game, you're always thinking about the Dungeons and the Dragons, and right now, if you enable content sharing on the D&D Beyond and one of your pals has a Master Tier subscription, your whole campaign crew can share all the materials and the content, not just the DM. Anybody with a Master subscription can do it, so jump on the "L," take the Eisenhower to the Kennedy, throw back a PBR or a 312 and grab a deep dish on me, because life just got a little better with the D&D Beyond. Oh, and don't forget to call dibs on the Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes, out next month. Pre-order yours on the D&D Beyond site and get all kinds of exclusive stuff and junk. Go Bears!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nailed it. Nailed it in one. Thank you, Sam, and thank you, awesome folks at D&D Beyond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And sorry, Chicago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sausage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot of options, lot of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make sure Sam exits the plane first. Sam exits the plane first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're excited, and we’ll see you guys there in a couple days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe have chosen too many dice tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What were the words you just used?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just-- okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no such thing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's hope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vox Machina: Origins, issue six, the last comic of this six-issue run, finishes soon. The date is April 18th. April 18th will be the release of the final issue of this arc.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all die in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In an attempt to cast a spell to understand the language, the creature seemed to deem it as an aggressive stance and then rushed you. And that's where we left off, so to begin, I'd like you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so fast!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am ready, my body is ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, I chose poorly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you did. You rushed the process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? All right. Let’s see here. 20 to 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top, we've got Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In love? Fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. Top of the combat round, as it pulls its jagged blade out of its side and darts forward in the direction of the group, Beau, you actually have the first reaction. Seeing this happen, you immediately jump into action, and what's your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone speak Dark-Shady-Guy-in-a-Sewer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don’t have time to react. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to get out the rope and climbing hook that I had from earlier, and I'm going to say, Jester, catch! Oh, wait, you're super last. Okay, never mind. I'm going to rush to him and see if I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over at Jester, who is holding Caleb up and is not even paying attention. You're like, "Shit!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to rush to him and see if I can grapple? I'm so bad at grappling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you? Is it strength-based? Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's athletics-based.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My athletics is okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to see if I can take the grappling hook and swing it around and grapple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So go ahead and make your athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually beat him. Wow. That was a five plus ten on that one. That was a 15. So you wrap the rope around and, immediately, it's grappled in place, unable to move. Although its arms are free, it cannot seem to pull itself away from you. So that's your action-- that's your attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to see if I can do a blow to his temple with my elbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is just an off-handed attack, right? 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does not hit. You swing, and the head ducks out of the way. It swings wide and it glides against the edge of the leather mask, but makes no impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 does not hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you hear that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, none of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's very important.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Beau make out with the Crick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 does not hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16 doesn't hit him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got him wrapped and grappled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that was fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does, you watch as this tiny bead of darkness appears in the center of the area and expands until a sphere of pitch-black light completely engulfs this space, and none of you can see into it or past it. You are blind within this sphere, and you guys see the whole hallway, it consumes the creature and Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Neat trick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, darkvision in that is still blind if you go in there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. We could hit Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end its turn. That brings us to Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head up to the other side of the void. Yeah, I’m going to sit there. I'm going to start one of the blades up, and I'm going to hold my attack for anything that crosses my path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So if anything comes within range that you want to attack--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I'll say the minute I see something, it's Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The minute you see something, Vicious Mockery, got it. Okay, all right, so you draw your blade out, you take the damage, and you prepare Vicious Mockery. Got it. All right. That ends your turn, Molly. Caleb and Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're up already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are up on the same turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: It's literally right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Crick is right between these two? Beauregard and Molly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you go first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don’t call it a Crick, it’s insulting, it’s a derogatory term.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Xhorhasian? Okay. Uh. Shit, I don't know. Why are we attacking this person?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he attacked us first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He’s covered in hooked armor and running at us aggressively.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let’s subdue him and talk to him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I will go-- I will destroy the initiative ranking! I will send my globules of light into the darkness to see if it has any effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the globules go in, they blink out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! His spell is higher than your spell!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then I'm going to back up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you send all of the globules in there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, let’s say two of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The two blink out. The two remain there, but the other two you sense that they're no longer in existence. You have two globes lighting up the area now. It's low light in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the same time I will back up my full movement while Frumpkin runs into the edge of that darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. That ends your turn. Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. Maybe they speak-- No, I don't know. All right. I will cast Message, and I will point into the darkness at the creature. I'll say: Do not fight us! We are no fans of the empire either! You can reply to this message. Do I sense a reply?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not sense a reply. But for the hell of it, go ahead and make a persuasion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a two minus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, just a two minus one, Matt. I'm still in the black.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Finishing, Nott, do you want to move anywhere?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go front and left. Is there anywhere to hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in this area, no. You'd have to get over here to hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I will bonus action dash over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Good to know. That finishes Nott and Caleb's turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh! Okay. I'm going to prep the spell Hold Person and I'm going to wait to cast it until I can see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you want to move at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move across the sewer across from Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. Fjord, you have Armor of Agathys on. You cast that reactionary last time, so what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stop if I come into the light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You stop as soon as you come to the other side. As you rush past, there's a (swoosh) in the darkness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, you get cut!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That’s okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 25 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pray tell, it doth hit. That's okay, I've got the armor on. I've got that armor, boo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did roll very high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all right, he's going to take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is ten points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, all ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he takes damage back, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He does take ten ice damage back, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you run by, the blade strikes. You manage to feel it glide off your ice armor and you feel the blast of ice energy. You, Beau, as you're holding the rope, feel this spray of dark cold and you wince at it in the darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate these rides!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that gets you on the other side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, for a bonus action, can I make a perception check to see if there's anybody on the other side of the tunnel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You glance over in the area. In the darkness, the light's fading at this point, but you have darkvision. You don't see any other figure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I about-face and wait on the other side of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Waiting on the opposite side. You got it. All right. That brings it up to the top. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I still have him restrained. I can't see or do shit. Still holding onto the rope, can I full-on football tackle him and try and push him out of this dark cloud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Try and shove, you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you have someone grappled, you can pull them at half movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'll do that, then. I'm going to start, with the rope wrapped around, start like a lifeguard, backing out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way or this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, towards Fjord. I felt Fjord go by, so I want to try and go towards Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you manage to push it out of it, right there, and you're both outside of the darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look what I caught!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You caught a big one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah I did!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, he's outside the darkness?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we can't see him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but he's across from me, through the darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's through the darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Help me subdue him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will when it's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, that's your movement. You still have an action if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do another crack to the forehead with my off-handed attack. That's a natural one. No! Wait. No, it is. I thought it was a seven. Thought it might be a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say as you swing, he manages to loosen the grip a little bit and the rope comes a little bit loose. If it attempts to break your grapple, it's going to have advantage on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the beginning of its turn, it's now grappled up in front of you. It pulls its blade with both of its hands and its head turns back towards you, now that you're the one who's been pushing it out, and it begins to unleash two heavy strikes against you. That's another 25 and that's going to be an 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wooshed!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ouchies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 20 points of slashing damage from the two strikes. As the first blade impacts across the front of Beau's chest, there's this strange grayish flash of energy that seems to scatter from the impact of the blow, and it congeals off to the side, and you watch as this, for lack of a better term, a shadow clone of the creature appears off to the side, behind Fjord, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks semi-corporeal. It's still holding the blade, it has the same armor, but it's somewhat translucent and made of this dark grayish shadow energy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not burned into the skin, it appears to be magically placed, but you have a brand on your chest that you don't recognize.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's like Hex or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end its turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have I heard any of this happening or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you've heard them impact. It's just darkness, but you hear yelling and shouting and then talking back and forth and then Beau taking damage and this strange shifting of energy in the distance. What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for gods' sakes. I am going to run straight through the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30. You get to the edge of it. You can barely peek out. You can continue to move, but it'll be your action to continue to move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm going to stay at the edge of this and I'm going to use Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (demonic voice) Stop where you are!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is wisdom, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does Molly do birthday parties for kids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure that passes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That passes, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Vicious Mockery seems to be unaffected by your demonic voice. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! We have to talk to him, you guys. We're not going to beat him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's us again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin will run forward out of the darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Towards the action. Yeah, and poke his head out, actually, closer to-- He'll come out between Molly's legs. Peek right out there. I'm sitting down in the muck in the sewer and I'm now watching and listening to use Comprehend Languages through Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, sounds good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Non-lethal damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, it's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, it hasn't come yet. You're right

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Although I don't really know what I'm going to do. Who do I still see? Just Caleb way in the back. Jester--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Caleb and Jester there and this curl of darkness--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I hear anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you hear all the sounds happening and the shouting and the impact--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I don't know where they're coming from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear them around that corner. That's all you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go around the darkness. Around it, counter-clockwise, to see if I can see around the other side without going into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get with your movement. You could bonus if you want to move around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will bonus dash around, just to look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From there you can see your friends. You can see Fjord. You can see the creature. You can see the shadow form out of the side. You can see Beau, with a hint of Molly poking out of the darkness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to shoot the shadow form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelps) 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 20 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you watch as it dissipates. The impact hits it, and you see it react slightly, and then vanish into vapor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it. That's all I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a question, because I've never prepped a spell and then not used it. Does that use the spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's balls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast the spell and then hold the very last moment, waiting to release it, and then if it doesn't happen, the spell expends. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, can I go and see what's going on around the big black spot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. (counting) 30. You can just manage to see Nott at the corner of it, and that's about as much as you can see. The rest of it’s just darkness still encompassing the corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll use my dash to go forward and see what’s going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 or 30? You could get either of those spaces there, if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there, all right. So now you can see it, but that's your movement and your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams) I know, right? This is crazy! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, but I have a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a bonus, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to use-- wait, wait-- Healing Word on Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast that. Okay, so that is 1d4.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What will you sing to her? Oh, wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope. Whoa. (childish voice) Three plus three is six points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ouchies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like that an eight-year-old boy delivered those points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Beau, it's your turn. No, it's Fjord's turn, sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's right, Fjord's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run up behind the assassin and, using the blunt end of the falchion, the non-edged side, can I try and strike non-lethal damage into the back of his head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Go for it, roll for an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get advantage because he's bound? Grappled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are technically on opposite sides, so I would say flanked. I'd allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Barnacle blow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Barnacle blow. 18 plus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know barnacles scream when you scrape them off of things?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. That's not true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they do, they go (screams)--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, now, non-lethal--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same damage. If you bring it to zero, they go unconscious, not bleeding out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 12 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage. Whack! You swing across and slam it from the back of its armor and (grunts) you hear this exhale of pain out of its throat. As it hits, it spins around and you watch as that same energy that came out earlier when it struck Beau, the blow that you hit it dissipates into the same energy and then forms into another shadow version of it behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he still taking damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's taken damage. He's getting hurt, he's hurt pretty bad. Does that finish your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Top of the round, Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh God. Okay--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's not hurt enough, apparently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to first try and tighten my grip on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And can I try and bulldoze him down to the ground and pin him to the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you need a feat, the Grappler feat, to then pin somebody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. I'm going to also try and do non-lethal damage and knock him on the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two attacks. Yeah, first one’s a natural 19. Second one is another natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The 19 does hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, 1d8 plus four is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see white teeth that have pretty prominent incisors visible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take a free action to be like: We just want to talk to you, damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just shouting, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Half-elves did. I remember team half-elves did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Advantage on saving throws on being charmed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you get one more roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll low, roll low!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a wisdom save, so it's ten plus my wisdom modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's eight plus-- yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, that's 13.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Still fails. All righty. So as the eyes glass over for a minute, the snarling and the tension in the muscles relax for a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not with the empire. We're private individuals just trying to get by. We wandered into a lot of chaos, so we just want to know what we're getting wrapped up in right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Untie me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You attacked us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You rushed me and began to assault me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we didn't! You came at us with your sword out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast a spell so I could try to understand your tongue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He keeps looking at you. It's ignoring the rest of them. It goes, "What happened to the "Beacon?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the Beacon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Beacon." It looks around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's under a dirty rag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. It's just glancing about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's right there. Is it important?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Very."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why? I'm just trying to understand, friend. Help me help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You Jerry Maguire motherfucker. Help me, help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are here to retrieve the Beacon from the empirical bastards in Zadash. We had it. I have "it. I don't know what happened to my companion, but, so far, I am successful. And I need it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is the beacon for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The beacon is part of our culture. The beacon allows the rebirth."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The rebirth of what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of our people."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's important. People need to be born.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am personally of the opinion that we just let everything go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you mean rebirth or do you mean reanimate? Let's be honest here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't even pay attention to Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My friends are your friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got one job on this ship. It's stupid, but I'm going to do it! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're making a very, very good argument, and my friends are your friends. We're all here to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Beacons are sacred. I have lived four lifetimes. As long as the Beacons remain, me and "my people will live more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you make babies still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We do."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And they live as long as the Beacon lives too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The souls continue. With each rebirth, the memories retain."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is your intention for the people in this empire, this kingdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is the intention of the empire?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, your people's intention, for all those who live here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We live. We worship. We learn. We die. We are reborn until we are perfect."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We find more Beacons."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's more of them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this thing what we saw take out half the Zauber Spire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. That was my companion." You see at this point, now, as friendly as it has been, there's this look of, "I might be saying too much and I don't trust the most of you still.”

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry to tell you, but I think your friend may have got hit on the end of something fierce and may not have made it. I thought I saw someone fly by and take him out. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it just the two of you or were there more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For this mission, just the two of us. We had help, but..."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are you trying to get to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Out. Of the city."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who was your help, if it was just the two of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've said too much. Either kill me or let me go."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has to be someone in the city. Who was it? You don't tell us, we'll find out one way or another. I can tell you that right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're trying to fight corruption in this city in our own way. We just need to know who we can trust and who we can't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can either help us get there faster, or we'll just take the long goddamn way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You cannot trust anybody in this city. You cannot trust yourselves. Anyone who has not bound "themselves. They are the enemy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the beacon? What do you bind yourself to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a moment of very tightly closed eyes. The jaw clenches as he looks about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know my vote, but anybody else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he was going to answer. I thought he was going to answer!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to let him go, don't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eh, not our problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should let him go. I think he's handsome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless, under one condition. You tell us who you were working with in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, tell us. We'll let you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I cannot. Our allies in the empire are short on the list."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it Kara? Dolan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ulog? Checking his face for reactions to any of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly. Anything? Any reactions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I help her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can me and Fjord tag team this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Better than me. 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers on a 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not in a very strong place. The charm spell is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charm spells are mean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does charm spell work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great. I've got it, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do two people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam, what are you looking forward to in Chicago? Is it the sausages? The brats? The deep-dish?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know that deep-dish pizza there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I feel like we've kept him up long enough. We don't have to get him out, we just have to give him the chance to get out. I think we should do that. He's given us everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And give me the beacon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? He hasn't told us shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will the beacon hurt people, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to insight check him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Kind of hard to read on this one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What will you do if we say no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will strike you down where you stand and take it. It's too important."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's rude. I'm going to start moving towards untying him unless anyone's got any--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a smart guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're all good--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We leave him only if we leave the beacon with the Gentleman, but if we leave him on his own--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Was it the Gentleman? Is he who helped you in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, was it the Gentleman?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Insight check. Do I get advantage because he's friends with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'll say. Yeah. Why not?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Double insight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's not bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not bad. 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More whispers! Just whispers. It's all whispers. Oh, guys. D&D Beyond, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is there to say that hasn't already been said by me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Personally, this seems like more than I feel like taking on right now. I say we walk away, and you'll know that our silence means that we were trustworthy in the first place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then you can be our friends later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you'll leave the beacon? Free me. Give me the beacon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll be off of our tail in like two minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever pawned anything before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that this thing is a great responsibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We removed his armor. We should give him something to leave in so he's not just walking buck through the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now we're getting silly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if he comes back and destroys us with this thing in six months? Two months?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He won't. He likes us, right? You won't do it? Will you promise not to hurt us later?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, he just said he's going to kill us if we don't give it to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But what if we give it back though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I run."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we should kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seems dangerous to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man. This is a really tough one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And super different than five seconds ago when you said we should just let him go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't we leave it up to him? We untie him, he comes at us bros, we take him down. We're giving him a chance at freedom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the beacon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He doesn't get the beacon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not going to leave without the beacon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we give him the beacon and we walk away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He'll come after it. I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can look at the beacon one more time and try to see what it is, and then we can give it back to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that. No?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it scare you that much?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look at the beacon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did he get worried when we said we were going to take a look at it one more time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He didn't seem to flinch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it's that scary, then what do you want to do with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can anybody else concentrate on it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we leave this gentleman here and take the beacon, it becomes his life's work to find us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we either leave him and it, or we take it and kill him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we can take it now and kill him later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just saying, it could be like a fun game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I won't speak for anybody in the group, but I'm not taking his life. So, if someone feels motivated, I'll just walk over this way. And I start walking back the way we came.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Give it back to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't-- why are you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't. It’s on the ground under the dirty rag,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it is? I go and look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its eyes go wide, and you feel the soft undulating low hum to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (hums) I hum back at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you match the tone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does he do when we’re looking at it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk over and scrape my radiant sword against the orb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to take a few steps back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do, he's like (growling).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just seeing. Just going to give it a little tap. I’m not cutting it, I'm just tapping it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it taps. It sounds like you're tapping some sort of a stone or rock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the radiant energy have any effect on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it does not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I don't know what it is. And if you're not going to look, what use do we have for it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I know some people. Why don't we bag this thing up and we'll take it right over to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These two individuals were responsible for blowing a hole in that tower, yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm not talking about anything--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not contradicting what you're saying, I'm sorry. When you say, "What use do we have for "it?" It's a dangerous thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It didn't do it. The beacon wasn't the thing that did it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: New plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: New plan. All right, we can't decide if we should leave him, or take the thing, or take the thing but leave him, or kill him, or-- why don't we take both him and the thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And what do we do with him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Front doorstep, leave a note, "You're welcome."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to kill him, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And apparently so are we? Or at least talking about it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do they do there? I don't know much about the Cobalt Soul. What can you tell me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They hold information. They've got a decent amount of relics and spell books and things that they might know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it would endear us to the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they're technically a little bit separate from the city. They're kind of not necessarily a part of the empire. They kind of make sure the empire stays in check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your name again, friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) This long, heavy sigh. Hearing all this conversation and not knowing who to trust, even in spite of your spell. "Thuron."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Help us out, here. I'm Molly, and I-- Give my friends more to go with. Give them something, some reason to trust you, to make sure that this is not going to come back and bite us in the ass. I mean, that's what we're looking for, here, is a reason for us to be able to walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then walk away."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question. When he said Thuron, did I hear Thuron, or did I hear some other word, like eagle, or swift, or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The name itself does have meaning in Undercommon. It is a name.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I didn't hear Bob, right? Did it have a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The nuance to the word, from what you can best understand, is-- it means "blessed second "born" is the best I can find the right words for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should send him to a monastery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm good either way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did you lose the thing in the first place that you need to get it back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was taken from Xhorhas."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles darkly) Grins and looks up. "From your fucking wizards."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have any wizards. Well, I have one wizard, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't like the other wizards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, to be fair, they are kind of arseholes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was stolen from him! We should just let him have it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did they take it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know the details."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did they come to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was just sent to retrieve it. I don't know all the answers."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sent by whom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "By my empress."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your empress? Which empress would this be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't know much, do you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know anything. It's part of my charm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Empress Leylas Krynn."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leylas Krynn. Did I say it right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Question was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Context of the name. Anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, actually, that one is a proper name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Leylas Krynn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Empress o' the drow? Or o' Marrow Valley?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the Marrow Valley is in the empire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. My facts are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Dwendalian Empire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we're in the Dwendalian Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in the Dwendalian Empire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, wait, sorry. I meant Xhorhas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Xhorhas is to the east of here. It's the wastes to the east of the Ashkeeper Peaks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's where you're from? Xhorhas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He nods, slowly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the Dwendalian Empire is fighting you? And they're stealing your babies? Because this is the only way you can have babies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stares at you, confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It all makes perfect sense to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we give him his armor, and that thing, and be on our way. This is none of our concern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say we give him the thing and let him walk around naked, because that's better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That could be funny, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's close to a death sentence. How about we give him some crownsguard armor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you can get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you will give me the beacon?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're just going to leave it here. I think that's fair, we didn't give him anything. We found him, he attacked us, we defeated him, we walked about our way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're letting him leave without the beacon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're leaving the beacon on the ground, Beau.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I suggest, leave it for him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he's not going to take it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know what he's going to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering dramatically) Yes, he's going to take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right with this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm okay with this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anyone else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I defer to the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you've got a strong opinion otherwise, Caleb, on that thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you've got a strong opinion on that thing otherwise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am able to tell a great many things about a great many things, and that is beyond me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should stare at it some more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's beyond you, then it's beyond me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless you really want to. Huh? Do you? Do you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Open the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we just let it go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: LAURA & MARISHA: (singing) It's in a book, Reading Rainbow!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm calling it, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still say we load up both of these guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out-- oh wait, you know what, I think I don't have full armor for the crownsguard because I gave them away. I gave them back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you returned them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't got no crownsguard armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just give him his bits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, he definitely does not get a secret disguise to help him get through the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're giving him everything but the black boots, the sword and the sheath and his money.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're taking his shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give him just the armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He gets his armor back. But you don't have the shoes, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll leave it right next to the bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just saying, it feels like we're leaving an opportunity in the sewer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are good opportunities and bad opportunities, and this one is giving me the vibration that perhaps we should just leave him be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to be our best friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he's going to be a little irritated at me in about half an hour. I'm going to start fraying the rope just a bit, so that it'll be breakable with a little bit of work. Are we off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, are you fraying it with your sword?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Just give it a little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The-- (trails off and chuckles)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moment the rope breaks--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wasn't going to break it, I was just going to fray it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He uses that point to grab the blade and swing around and pull it up against you. "I'm sorry, I need your help."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can do that when he's charmed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not cutting him, he's just grabbing, going, "I'm sorry, I need your help," and is holding you now against the wall, looking at the rest of you, and says, "Leave me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we’re doing! Jesus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were literally just doing that. And boy, I've got to tell you that you are

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pushes you off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Your stuff's over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rushes over and pushes the cloth off the beacon real fast, picks it up and holds it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go (hums).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes over and starts picking up the armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we gave him the armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we gave it back to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Not the boots, not the sword, not the gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They said it four or five times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts on the armor. Puts on the mask. Puts on the leg armor. Takes the beacon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't run out the same exit that we do, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around and darts deeper into the sewers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) That's the way we were going to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to say, right now, that was the easiest 20 platinum I've ever made in my entire life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we just made so much money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we follow him? See where he's going?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just saying, maybe there's some cool portal or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are they getting in and out, man?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever they do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He left all his shit-- his armor he's wearing, but all his other shit was left around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other shit you have, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We scooped it up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in the bag.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he heading deeper into the sewers the way the spiders were?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why are you so keen on this one? I mean, that was a lot. I don't want to get involved in that. That's crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is wars between empires. Do you really care?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't care about wars between empires, I just like having more information. For later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should get back to the Song and Supper Inn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You mean the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Song and Supper. See if Dolan’s there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are short one, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ulog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a shout in the distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, go, go, go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the direction that you're traveling, echoing down that way. And you see a flash of firelight, torchlight in the distance. You hear a (hiss) and the sound of weapons clanging--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where he went?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, in the direction he went.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he was going in the direction we were going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then it goes quiet, and you hear voices say, "We got him! We got him!" And other voices, and around the corner up ahead you can see a little bit of torchlight flickering against the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, whatever it is, the empire just got it back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should have just strapped him up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to end this really quickly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: End it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could go over and get involved in that, since you seemed so keen--

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, now you don't want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had control of it when it was still in our hands. We don't have control anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, as a sidebar, if we want the other half of our earlier plan to work, we need to get to Dolan, we need the crownsguard inside Sutan's house as quickly as possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you say, you said we're down one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Ulog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened to Ulog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Yeah. Well, in the fray of the Richter coming in, he lunged at her and put a little gem in her mouth. They exploded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye on the path to make sure nobody's coming down our direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Hand me the object, please. The item sheet.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That could have easily been a blank piece of paper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it wasn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It wasn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have looked at it more!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I looked at it plenty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He also technically memorized it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. All the question marks. I memorized all the question marks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't work that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that was too mysterious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. There's some other muffled voices down the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We don't want to be a part of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But wait. Is there another exit? Or is it back to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's back to the Tri-Spires.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear footsteps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, come on, we're going back up? We're either fighting crownsguard or getting out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Back the way we came.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Back it up, back it up, back it up, back it up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you guys doing coming this way?! We were going the other way!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a long story, go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bad at this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Be quiet, we're being followed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh God!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shh! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you drunk, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not yet, but now I will be!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys manage to head back up into the Tri-Spires, back into the alleyway. As you close and lock the thing behind, a voice in the back of the alley-- you guys watch as two crownsguard approach and go, "Hey! You!" And both pull their swords to hold out in front, and one guy in the back, a third one arrives with a crossbow up to you guys and says, "Hands up, weapons."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One, two, three? Don't know who you're point-- oh, everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be all of you guys as you got out of the sewer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We came back up. Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your business?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were scared, things were falling from the sky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We took cover in the sewers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were working at the festival. We're just trying to get out, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has the danger passed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) I will say, since it wasn't a single person, I'm going to ask for a deception roll from both of you, since you were the first two to speak up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is going to be great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do you get advantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know why I took advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, don't get advantage. Roll one more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or you can take the lowest? No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't want to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God damn it. Nine plus-- 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you rolled a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They take a moment. "Get out, we're investigating." They move in, and they don't take their arms off of you. They get behind you and move you out of the alley, into the street, and begin pushing you guys in the direction of the outer wall of the Tri-Spires.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, sir, we have coworkers that were working at the festival. Do you know anything about this attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this flickering arcane energy underneath it that occasionally a wave goes (whooshing) that's holding it aloft. You can see crownsguards are now-- some are shifting in the streets, going and weaving through the buildings, and there's a bunch at the actual exterior wall, and they eventually push you through, and lead you into the central part of the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they still with us, or did they push us away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They pushed you away, and you guys are now in the Interstead Sprawl.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should stop by the Song & Supper Inn, see if we see a friendly face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go, before they realize we were down there with the guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we walk, I'm going to ask Fjord, did you catch any weird twitches, or any signs that he was lying?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know if you saw, but his eyes and his nostrils flared when we mentioned Ulog. I have a feeling our small dwarf friend was involved in quite a bit more than we were aware of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, maybe we were assholes for not noticing that him handing over his entire life savings was a little suspicious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he give that to us before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, down in the basement when we were talking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He gave it to us already, or it was an after sort of thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't get it yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was lying. He's not giving us any of the money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even more reason to find Dolan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He showed it to us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was part of the pot, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet it exploded when he did. He exploded.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is correct, right? We have not been paid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have not been paid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except for the 112 platinum we just got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is pretty dope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What-what!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many gold is a platinum?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who are the two that are keeping point, leading you guys to the Song and Supper?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You asked for two people!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, okay. You catch it first, and you corroborate it. As you guys are heading down the road, near the sewer exit where you guys were previously, there's a commotion gathering on the side of the street.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go check it out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a crowd around it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a crowd gathering now, and you hear gasps and people starting to shout.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I send Frumpkin scurrying between people's legs into the crowd, put my hand on Beau's shoulder and go blind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've never seen one up close like this." There's this murmur in the crowd as all about the guards are like, "Don't worry, don't worry. Both of them "are dead. You're safe now, thanks to the might and the trust of the empire. The king keeps you safe."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do Frumpkin and I see the doohickus? The dodecahedron?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see it being held by one of the guards in one of his hands, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's all be clear that whatever the empire wants, they'll fucking take.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we take that thing from them? Those guys don't know what that is. Let's go get it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of the guards pick the body up, and one of them puts it over his shoulder, and all of them cluster together as the crowd follows them. Some of them are taking sticks and poking at the body as it goes. The guards are like, "Please, stop, no."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we run interference and try to trip the guard and get the thing back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, if we want it. Do we want it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, we're going to try and get it

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can disguise yourself. You can disguise yourself as Crick!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we go try to look at the body and then we accidentally fall on one of the guards and we make him drop it and then Nott picks it up and runs away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm definitely super injured, but this sounds fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're heading in the direction of the King's Hall, it looks like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run up and try to look at the body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you move and weave into the crowd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, what is that? Is that a dead body? Whoa, I've never seen one of those!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push up and look, and the body has deep lacerations all through the torso and back. It looks like they cut him until they were sure he was dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're in an alleyway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're heading down the street right now, they're turning the corner heading down to the main thoroughfare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I trip and fall right in front of the guard that's carrying the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I’m going to trip and fall! Right in front of him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We had it in our hands!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I’m going to cast Disguise Self as a crownsguard and just follow. Just see what's happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to parkour elf, get on the-- Elf? Monk, get on the roof of the nearest building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an acrobatics check, just for the hell of it. Just to see how fast you get up there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? And make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it hums.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm tripping and falling in front of the guard carrying the thing as I'm trying to look at the body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm casting Mage Hand, just in case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God damn it. Why deception? I'm just falling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is as you falling forward, "Ah!" and make a scene.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is just to see how--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, I rolled a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the guy's-- as you fall in front of him, he's like, "Please, miss, move away." And two of the guards rush forward and start picking you up and shoving you off to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man. I want to trip him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Nott? Where are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just following behind. Behind Jester, by 30 feet or so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More people are coming out now and gathering the crowd around, to see them pull this dead Crick through the street. Word's getting around and people are--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As they try to pull me away, I'm going to try to hook my foot around the ankle of the guard carrying the thing and, as I'm standing up, try to trip him to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I will say make a dexterity check, if you don't mind. Just a straight dexterity check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is the matter with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21! You barely manage to--Your foot doesn't quite reach, but your tail does. As it scoops around his ankle: (yelps). He falls back and lands--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't drop it! Don't drop it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you are disguised as--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As a crownsguard. I was walking alongside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Okay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, come on, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And you catch it. The guy starts getting back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, I'm so sorry! That hurt my tail so much. I'm so sorry! Are you okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He grabs you by the front of your armor and goes, "You need to get out of our way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry. It just looked so inter-- I'm really impressed with how well you took down that guy, though!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I follow Caleb as he traces around, but on the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That guy pushes you off--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm standing with Fjord, in shock and horror.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just full, "Ah."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He starts looking around the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a stealth check, because you're holding a glowing, undulating device.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It’s white and glowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a deep grey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What changed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 14.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Dressed as a crownguard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I crouch down on the roof above Caleb, and I go (bird coo).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeing Caleb walk away with the object, I'm going to cast Silent Image, and make the image of the object, glowing, about 30 feet away from them on the ground. (dissonant humming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there's two of them, currently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One in my hand, and one on the ground. But I've got it like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your spell DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My spell DC is-- It's plus-- Oh, sorry, hold on. Silent Image is-- Come on, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your intelligence modifier?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's plus three is my spellcasting modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it'd be 13, would be your spell DC.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I will say that the two guards that noticed you leave with the object, even though they're coming over to be like (confused stuttering). They see the other object over there, and they both get confused and look at the two. As they're standing, trying to figure out what to do, they both split. One goes for the object over there; one goes for Caleb. He's catching up to you and goes like, "Hey! Hey. We're going to the-- We're going to the hall of the king."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I just want to get it away from the crowd. This thing seems dangerous to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now walking, trailing behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's just-- a little further back, like another ten feet. I don't know if this is going to blow. It's better that it's just you and me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Some other townsfolk are starting to, like, walk up to get a look at this object now that the crownsguard are holding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what's around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you're off, you're behind the group. The large cluster is moving maybe about 60, 70 feet ahead of you now. You are back-- when it was turning onto the main street is where all this transpired. So you're a little bit off, past the corner of where they are. They're just starting to curve out of sight. And you are walking with the guard now in that direction, slowing down. The other object that you caused the illusion of is the other way, and the guard has about 100 feet or so to walk to get to it. And he's partway there and he hasn't quite learned what the scenario is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, good, so I cast Friends on this crownsguard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that make it drop?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. It's not concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the saving throw on it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just gives you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there a saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage to charisma rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, advantage to charisma rolls. If he’s not under attack or thinks he’s threatened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, all right, cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage on charisma checks at one creature of your choice that isn't hostile towards you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And he is not currently hostile towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So listen. Don't die for this. I will take this. Just walk ahead. This thing blew a hole in the side of that tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check, with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The first was a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you say that-- Oh, shit! Thank god for Friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stabbing sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you say that blew the hole in the tower, you watch him take an instinctual step back. "Right. I'll go catch up."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've seen balls of fire take out half a city block.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right." He darts ahead, looking over his shoulder as he starts to try and join up with the crowd.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I turn into an alley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (pigeon cooing) Cover it up. Walk away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can turn into an alley?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another stealth check, because there's other folk now that are coming out and are seeing this. The other guard has just now gotten up to the illusion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, are there other guards around me? I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. There's the other guard that was paired with him that went off to go after the illusion that Nott had created.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trying to avoid the paparazzi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly and I are running after Caleb, since we saw the other guard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm staying put, and as soon as the guard gets close, I'll make it slowly rise up into the sky, just like 12, 13 feet up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that give me advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What spell is this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is Silent Image. I can move it. I just can't make it make a sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so as it drifts up in the air, the guard goes, "Uh." Looks around. All the about 17 or so townsfolk had began to converge to look up at it. They're all like, "Ooh." They're all excited looking at it. It's definitely distracting the current group. The one guard there is like, "Go, back! Back!" to everybody. He's starting to look nervous, because he doesn't know why it's lifting up, and he's uncertain about what's happening. You make a stealth check. You're only getting it because they're distracted by that. To try and duck into the alley unseen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I near him at all? Can I give him a blessing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not quite close enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you duck into the alleyway, not sure if you've been seen. All right. What are the rest of you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly and I are trucking after where Caleb just went through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Walking at a very gentle pace in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm on the roofs, been tracking Caleb this whole time. On the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So you guys go behind. As you begin to approach, you can see there are two teenage kids, a boy and a girl, that are dressed nice enough. Both are like, "Did you see what he was "holding? I want to see it." They both go into the alleyway after Caleb as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any doors or anything in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like there's a solid wall on one side, and an arch that leads into a small walkway that leads between the buildings. If you keep going, then it splits off into a T intersection of alleyways, right or left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a left? All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just keep going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop down in front of the kids Batman-style.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stay in school!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't take my fucking line before I get a chance to say it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So sorry. I'm so sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Close, but different motive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you land and they both go, "Ah!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatcha buying, kids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh-- uh--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know that shit will fucking kill you, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check. With advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage because you just dropped down from the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, a natural one and a four. So five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The two kids go (scoffs).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take out my staff and I say: Do your parents know you're out this late? Or are you trying to prove something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not worth it. Come on." The girl, (sniffs) "Fine." They both turn and walk away, kicking the dirt a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And just for Taliesin, I say: Stay in school! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've know you too long now. I feel sick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What a perfect stay in school moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to stealth and try to track back towards Caleb. But make sure no one else is also following him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so you guys dart off into another alleyway. You still do hear guards shifting, but you start hearing other people are talking. People are starting to go back to their homes. They're whispering to each other. Listening in, you hear phrases being said, like, "The city's on lockdown. This is crazy. I'm supposed to be leaving tomorrow!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) This is a lockdown? Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now, the buzz of the town, even this late at night, as people are now either emerging to see the scene, or are returning to their homes, seeing what they have. But the crowd has dissipated, or at least the crowd has moved on towards the King's Hall, and are probably in the process of trying to figure out what the fuck happened to the object they were carrying. You guys manage to dart off to the side of the is the eastern end of the Interstead Sprawl. You aren't apparently followed at the moment, but you're still holding this glowing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we put it in the bag?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ordinarily, I would say yes, and I might want to put something else in there. But for the time being, I don't understand this thing enough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (mumbling) You want to put something else in the bag?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (giggles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's table that for now. I'm worried what will happen if this specifically goes into that bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because that is an extra-dimensional pocket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I don't know what this is, and I am worried that it could potentially create--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A black hole and suck us all in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, let's go with that. But maybe if we could procure a lead box to put this inside of, that will shield it from any possible searching that could happen for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A lead box?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A large, lead box, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we should go back to the Song & Supper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a hooded lantern we can put it in in the meantime.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It’s bigger than that.

lines.name: MATT
