lines.text: It's about that large. It's got two handles on each side. It looks like you're carrying a lantern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to find Dolan fast. We need to, I'm serious, find a lead box to put this thing in, because someone's going to want this very badly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's split the party. It's always the best idea. No, but seriously, we don't need everyone for both.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord and I found an additional cellar, where we found that skeleton, behind the Leaky Tap. Doesn't look like anybody--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still doing illusion shit. Have I finished that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so at this point now, the guard, who's down below, has called over like four other guards and they're all at the bottom of it. Some of them are getting their crossbows ready to shoot if it does something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll make it inflate, and then Salvador Dalí, start dripping. Just like (humming).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it swells and then behinds to drip, they all start backing away. The guards start pushing people away. The guy that was originally carrying it, with seven other guards, begins to approach the cluster. They have broken off from the procession with the elf body, and they've now joined up with the other guard. He's like, "There it is! Stay back; stay back." They're all nervously waiting for this thing, dripping, and doing nothing, and they're all scared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to start to boil and fizzle into steam, and dissipate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does, and there's a brief moment as everyone holds their breath.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tinkerbell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards all look at each other, very confused.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (announcer voice) Thank you for joining us for Fantasma. The park is now closed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wish I could be a fly on the wall when those wizards hear this story from the crownsguard, just like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (dopey guard voice) "I don't know. It just flew in the air, grew big, and then made sauce and "disappeared."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (dopey guard voice) "It was just like that cat I kicked the other day."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (disinterested voice) "Yes, very good. Take a lollipop from the bowl and get out." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'll try to rejoin them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both like, "Yeah, that woman was such a bitch," as they pass by.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know who they're talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, when you guys are discussing what to do, you hear the little-- Actually, we'll say largely you don't hear, but you see Nott appear at the cusp of your circle. You've caught up with the rest of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on? Where are we going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going back to the Leaky Tap, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how about Beau and I will go to the Song & Supper Inn and we'll meet you at the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and we'll try to find a box to put it in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, remember that additional cellar behind the Leaky Tap?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where we found a skeleton.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that might be safe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You think the basement with a dead person is safe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like this plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is a super long time? Like ten years? What is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Long enough for the body to decompose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Super clean bones. Like, at least, two years, I'd say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a conversation for another day. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the two of you are making your way to the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Song & Supper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Song & Supper, right. The rest of you guys are going to the Leaky Tap, but finding a box on the way you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to see if we can find, like, a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a shitty hardware store, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's past midnight, and most of the market is closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Claudia has a lead box at her thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do still have a glowing beacon in your hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, well, I'm going to take my cloak off and cover it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does cover it up. It's a very faint bit of glow that comes through the fabric, but it's enough where it probably won't be noticeable from a distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I’ve changed my mind, I think it can wait until morning, but for sure-- Well, if she has one, good, but it's a lot of disarray.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we need one. What if they try to find it, like, tonight, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, then let's go break into a store and get a lead box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, why does it need to be lead? I mean, you can turn anything into lead, can't you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not that particular material.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Why does it have to be that particular material?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because lead shields things from magical-- from divination magic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would they sell a lead box at a magic shop?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or even at the blacksmith's shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible. None of you are very well-versed in the ways of blacksmithing or lead objects, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pumat would have something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I would know that when I saw it. I know alchemy, I know all sorts of materials.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need a safe, is what we need.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we can wait until morning, though. How's the city looking? Are people ransacking? Are there looters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no looters, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. It's not that bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, and at this point now, the streets are fairly barren of crownsguard. They’ve all-- aside from the cluster that you saw moving through, there's a whole bunch at the perimeter gates of the Tri-Spire, and where they would normally be posted at the different corners of the streets, they are not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We’ll put some of your thread on it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that way it’ll be down there, unconnected to us just in case someone finds it, and if they do, we’ll know the minute they touch it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Smart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good. That's it. That is a great idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Teamwork. Fine, let's do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at us! We’re like a team.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Break!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Break?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you two are heading to the Song and Supper. Okay, and you guys are heading to the Leaky Tap? All right. So you head back. While you guys are heading that direction, you head to the Song and Supper. You manage to make your way there. It's still open. It's fairly empty on the inside, there's only two patrons that are present at this hour. It seems like the commotion has drawn most of what clientele would have been in there at the moment, and there’s only two patrons that are both halfway into their cups, and pretty drunk or tired at this point. But you look around and you don't see Dolan, you don't see Horris, you don't see Kara.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think the whole damn thing was a fucking distraction?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure feels like it, doesn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really don't like being used. Who's at the bar? Is there anyone at the bar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there is the general barkeep there, which would be-- Clay Owens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Clay Owens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's a balding, portly gentleman, middle age or so. As you walk in, he, "Aye, can I "get you something?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey Clay, how's it going? Long night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Crazy night, from what I'm hearing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, right? Can I go ahead and get a double to help with the night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, certainly. Here you go."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Had anyone come in tonight? Any one of the usuals? Seen Ulog? Seen Kara?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No? No. Oh no, Ulog was in earlier this evening."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He was here for a while, and then left with some friends. Think Dolan and his boy were in for "a bit. They rushed out in a hurry about an hour ago?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. You didn't see them rush out with anybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just the two of them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mention where they were going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, they just up and left. Figured they were done for the evening. They looked a bit hurried."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that we're looking for them, we're-- I don't feel very well and I don't have money for a proper physician. I'm sure we could find someone else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's usually where they practice out of."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he got food poisoning from the finger food at the gala. You should never trust that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Better get there soon, then. It's kind of late."

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Well, thanks, Clay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have a good night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries, here's your drink." He gives you the shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Slam it. Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Want to check his house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't-- That’ll be a silver."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I give him a gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes "I-- uh--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry, I was-- It's just the-- Just keep it. It's just the stress of the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you kindly!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I'm a little-- maybe next time, it's a round on you, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course!" He tucks it away. "Thank you!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, bye. All right, let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You feeling that double?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good. That's good. I just-- Damn, that was impressive. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, my tolerance is like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beast mode?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's at an unhealthy level. Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to go by Dolan's house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's see if those guys are there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you guys quietly make your way towards Dolan's house, as you approach, there's no light from the inside. Make a perception check, both of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! You both notice there is a quick bit of movement on the inside even though the lights are out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone's hiding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Well, I'll go up and knock. You want to go around back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure, make sure they don't try and run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I knock and say, it's Fjord with the Mighty Nein, open up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you go in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you head inside. It's dark in there, but you have your dark vision, so you look around and it looks like Dolan and Horris are both in there. Horris has a candle light with a side hood that's keeping it contained to a small area. Dolan goes, "Oh, thank god you're okay! We're trying-- "We don't know what to do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right. Take a breath. Is there a back door to this place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Through the bedroom."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau's going to be coming around the back, make sure she gets let in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." Horris is in the process of taking things and putting them into a sack. They are basically rapidly--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're leaving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can't stay here!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If they trace anything back to us, they're going to string us up in front of the tower."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, I think--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great, so now we have a murder on our hands, too."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horris goes, "Keep your mouth down! Please!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to make sure that Lord Sutan is implicated in this, but right now we're clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At this point, that doesn't even matter. We can't--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Richter's gone! You have a chance to ascend to her seat! Wasn't that the plan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, but if there is any chance they can bring that back to us-- maybe we leave town for a "short time. Maybe just go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop. Don't be a coward in this moment. If you want to help this city, if you want to help make the empire better, you're going to have to stand strong. A little risk is going to come with this job, especially in that position. You knew the risk going into this, didn't you? To put your money and your lives at risk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please. Maybe he's right, maybe they don't have a "way to bring it back. If we see this through--" Horris takes the satchel and sets it on the table, puts the candle below it and walks up, grabs the side of Dolan's shoulders, and says, "I "understand, but I don't want to lose you, and this scares the shit out of me." They both take a moment and look at each other. Horris looks at you and says, "I think you're right. Neither of us "know how to talk our way out of the guards if they come by, we're not good liars."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have a chance to do some real good here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horris nods. "Okay. Then we stay." And Dolan says, "No, I stay. Just in case things go wrong, I "want you safe and gone. If this is to be turned around, I'm the one they're going to look to. I’m "the one who actually has the political influence here. I'm the one who can talk and make a "difference, if that is to be done in the next few days, or the next week. If you can just, for a "while, trust me and just leave. Is that okay?" He looks to you, and Horris kind of-- "Fine, but I'll come back soon."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll keep an eye out. I promise. If anything needs to be shared between, you can rely on us to pass a message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dolan nods. "Okay. I'm good. Sorry, Horris, I don't need you for this. It would be stupid for "both of us, should anything go wrong, to be taken, swept up by this. Okay? Trust me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you in the house yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, I'm still out back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still out back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Fjord? Are you dead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horris rushes off and opens the back door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While all this was going on, can I do a quick little casing, intelligence to see if there's any thrown-away trash, burned evidence, or anything in the back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking-- fuck you, Gil. Six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You love him or you hate him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The big bad of campaign two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's piles of trash that are pushed in the corner. You look through and you don't find anything that catches your interest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Our efforts have incurred some damages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course. I don't have Kara's, but I have ours and I have Ulog's. He left that with us before he left tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he let me in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. He let you in at this point. Horris brought you in. He points over, too, and you can see there's a smaller sack and a larger one that's more of a backpack that seems to the be one that Ulog left. He goes, "Take them, please. That's of no use to us." At this point, Horris is letting Beauregard in, and knowing that it's just the two of you, he puts his hand on your shoulder and says, "Keep him safe. Get him out if you can, please.”

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anywhere you prefer? Is there a hiding spot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. Just out of the city. Just out of the city for a week. That's all I ask."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. We can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A cart rolls by and they all get very quiet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a little town not far from here called Alfield. It might actually have use for a doctor right about now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau has experience with this area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe. Okay."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Before you guys leave. It doesn't matter based on what's just happened. Is there anything that you guys know that we didn't about any other of the members of the Knights of Requital that might have a more invested interest in an invasion or getting back at anyone in the Zauber Spire? Sorry. Yes. That was the right one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Invasion? I'm confused."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm afraid Ulog may have had a larger game to play.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horris slaps the shoulder of Dolan and says, "I told you there was something up with that guy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why do you say that, Horris?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just didn't trust him. I mean, it took a while for us to be okay with each other, but he "was always on edge."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He left us in charge of finding justice for his wife, and we intend to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's something."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like you all had your own individual motives for why you were part of the Knights of Requital. You sure yours was just because you wanted to be the High-Richter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anywhere I could help change the law of the town."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I believe him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. Hard to read, but he seems forthright.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Let's help Horris get out of the city. Stay low. Stay here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will. Thankfully, when all this went down, we were both in the Song and Supper, so at "least we have an alibi. I've just never done something like this before. Pardon my nerves." You see his hands are literally shaking, and you see notice now he is very nervous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have a drink. It’ll help with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will." He goes off to the corner and pulls out a small glass bottle of liquor. He comes over, and him and Horris give a very tight hug to each other, and then separate. Dolan sits down, puts the drink on the table. “Thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course. We'll have to regroup, and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horris comes with you guys towards the Leaky Tap. You guys make your way to the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before we go in, we're going to go to the basement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go upstairs to try to talk to Claudia.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will say that on the walk, I would instantly Identify the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you will cast--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Identify.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The stone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From Sutan's house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here you go. A sending stone. One of two. You do not know where the other one is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, intrigue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like we had? Like Vox Machina had?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who? What? Who are you talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, where you speak into it. Not like where you hold onto it and you transport?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not that. That was a gate stone. This is essentially a means of communicating between two stones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once-a-day walkie-talkie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's exactly how you left it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the place. Are you with us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The skeleton’s right over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we put it behind the skeleton.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go take a look at this skeleton. I would like to try to ascertain how long this fucker has been here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Not great at all, like all my skill rolls. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A seven? Hard to tell. I mean, just looking at the level of decomposition, it's been here a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get anything from it? Is it a normal human skeleton?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Do I get anything from it?" You creepy bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check to see if you can ascertain the creature type.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It definitely doesn't appear to be anything beyond humanoid. The size, the shape of the skeleton, it's a standard humanoid skeleton, but you’re not able to tell anything beyond that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a calculated risk, which I am fan of, generally. But my thread, my magic would let me know if someone-- no, never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I can put a magical lock on the door to this basement as well. As well as an alarm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An alarm and a lock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would that do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (distant clattering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's upstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the spell will stop your average Joseph from coming in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like this plan. It's a good plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Very smart, as always.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But, you know, I think you and I should sleep down here tonight, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With the skelly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to need you upstairs for some identification. I think it would be less suspicious sleeping down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I worry-- well, I'll tell you my concerns and that is that this thing is beyond comprehension, even. And the desire to get it back is going to be great. This-- and I pull out the Sending Stone-- is just a stone that I stole from Sutan's house. This I'm not worried about. Would you put this in your backpack, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not with you. I'm upstairs trying to get a hold of Claudia.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you’re not with us? I'll have to ask Jester to put this in her backpack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So noted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But this thing was worth blowing up a tower for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if someone spies on it, I don't want them to see you with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we slept in our rooms--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can spy on a place. You can spy on a person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can spy on anything, I imagine. I mean, it's magic, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is why I want the lead box.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that really going to work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what if someone breaks in and we're here? Then we're attached to these objects. I mean, I'll sleep down here if you want. Maybe we can get rid of the skelly first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It’ll take 20 seconds to get here from the second that alarm goes off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, let’s hide it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a general survival check to pull things from the surrounding--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two plus three. That’s five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I help with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You look at it, the job he did, and you’re like, "Yeah, I can probably do a little better."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I can! Is this survival? Seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Always have someone check your work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Molly and Caleb put the skull on top of it together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It’s fine. Essentially, you didn’t do a masterful job in completely camouflaging it, but it looks like it’s the rest of the objects that looks dusty and left there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say there were crates down here too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were some barrels. There was an open crate with nothing in it. It’s a dusty, unused cellar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let’s put it behind the skeleton. If I came down here, I’d look in the crates. It’s the first thing I’d do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You would-- Oh. Never mind, I’m not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you hide it up and put it off to the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look in the crate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look in the crate? You look inside and see a fairly rat-eaten sack of rice grains that have spilled out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As well as a lot of rat droppings in the crate. It looks like some of the wood at the bottom has been chewed through as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I’m not there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope. Never mind. Damn. That was good thought, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a really good thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else, guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thread. Lock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What’s wrong, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I really think we should stay down here with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I’m game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of you, if not both of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don’t you and I stay down here for the night? You have anything you want me to identify, leave it, I can do that. You know what I have, I’m not leaving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? I mean, we don’t know what Fjord and the grumpy one have discovered. Maybe we should go upstairs and reconnoiter with them and then come down here, when it’s time for beddy-bye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will stay with this thing. You go up. When they come back, you come back down. My gut tells me to stay close to this thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I’ll stay with you, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I’m glad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we’re going to go in and out of this room several times tonight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The entrance to this is in the back of the building, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, yes. It’s in the alley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That in no way is suspicious, but that’s fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Nott, you go up. You can just Message me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, I can do that. Should I do that and then come back later?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and you come down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds like half the clubs in LA.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I’ll be back in less than an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got a quesadilla.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! All right. I’ll go up and see what they are saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While this is happening--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When they leave, I’m going to take the big item and put it on my person. I’m going to hold it, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you’re holding it there, it’s strangely warm to the touch. The more time you spend with it holding it there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not, like, looking into the abyss. I just don’t understand it and I’m just holding it there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Let me see here. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester had all the shit, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had all the shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. So you head back up into the Leaky Tap Tavern. There’s a handful of patrons, a lot of them are talking or whispering about the events tonight. Talking about, "The tower’s still up "there! It’s crazy!" The general conversation-hubbub through the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go to the barkeep. Is Claudia awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably in her office."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! I go and knock on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. "Who is it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It’s me, Jester!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Um, w-what do you want?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Claudia! When we were over at the Gala, we saw things that were going on, it was crazy, a tower exploded and then all hell broke loose. Did you know someone tried to steal my stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not know that. My apologies."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have maybe a safe or something? Because I don’t feel safe carrying around my jewelry anymore with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, not on me. Well-- "Come back in the morning, I might have something for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Claudia, are you naked? Why won't you open this door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flush.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I am busy at the moment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everything okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everything is just fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Claudia. Blink once-- knock-- say you're not okay if you're not okay because you sound weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm fine. Do not worry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. But you do have a safe I can put my jewelry in now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is currently in use, but I can swap it out. How long do you need it for?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I was going to put it in my room for as long as we're here, if that's okay with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, then come back in the morning. I will have it cleared out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then it will be at use for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you having sex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to come in? Are you okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You sound really weird. I try the doorknob.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cue the horror strings. (violin screeching)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have had this roommate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just about to say, Jester’s everyone's little sister when you're a senior in high school.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester's face pushes through the door!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get down on my hands and knees and try to look. Can I look under the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check with disadvantage because you are looking through a tiny little gap in the floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine? You see there's light in there and you can see Claudia darting back and forth behind her desk, moving very rapidly and with haste. Is grabbing things and seems to be writing something feverishly. But you don't actually see her, you just see the bottom of her feet moving back and forth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are so many fucking people trying to skip town?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shady motherfuckers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Claudia, what are you doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stops in the space. "Um, I'm--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everything okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everything's fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see the tower explode?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I heard about it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you let me in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That cuteness, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There should be an annoyance check. This is so great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give her advantage. Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. The door opens up and you can see Claudia looking as pristine as ever. Hair, makeup, everything done perfectly. "Come in, quickly."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Closes the door, brings you inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I come in now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't take no for an answer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How about now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am aware that you and your team were involved in something this evening. Am I correct?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we were at the Gala because we were having some fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you are not in any way, shape or form perhaps doing a burglary and job breaking in for "the Knights of Requital, yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who are that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two floors below we're putting a skull-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at you confused and goes, "Well, regardless, your friends are involved in something "that as a precaution, as I have been housing certain meetings out of friendship with an "individual, there is danger that I might be pulled up in this. So I am preparing to sell off the tavern."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Wait a minute, but wouldn't that draw attention to the tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It will only draw attention to me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks over and finishes tidying paperwork on the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who are you selling it to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general charisma roll. Just for the hell of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well see, this is why I-- oh no. Ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? She goes, "To a friend."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Friends are good. Can I have that safe though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) She kneels down at the side of the room and there's a cloth put over a small table, like an end table, and she removes the flowers from it, pulls the cloth off and it's a safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's it made out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Out of iron. What else would you make a safe out of?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls out a key and unlocks it, brings out a couple of bags of coin, brings out a couple other bags of something. You don't hear any noise, the rustling as she pulls it out. Sets them off to the side, looks at you while she does so the whole time like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are those drugs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here’s your safe."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hands it to you. It's small. It's heavy, but you're pretty strong. "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, all right. Will you be gone in the morning, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! But Claudia, I really like you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't worry. The woman I'm selling this to is also "a very good person and a good friend."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's her name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief pause, glances over at the paperwork on the table--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look down at the paperwork on the table, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lauren. Lauren Schvine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what it says?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I heard when we were coming back that they were putting the city on lockdown, so if you're going to leave, you should probably do it quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate the information. I should be okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good night. Thank you, Claudia, for all of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not a problem."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk very slowly out of the room and keep looking over my shoulder as I'm doing it and smiling back at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She watches and waits, sees you smiling, arms crossed on the desk, patiently waiting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to put this in my room, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be back here in a few minutes to pick up from that point. We do have tonight's Wyrmwood giveaway. That went all sorts of weird, interesting ways. Oh man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We almost killed a guy and then someone else killed a guy, we

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not all of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. Way late on that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was like a Pokémon, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. We have a winner. The winner for this evening is Iraginger. Iraginger, congratulations.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ey, represent!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, bringing us back into the game, you all begin to converge back in the Leaky Tap. The party has reassembled, aside from you, who are staying down in the basement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hanging out with my new friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yorick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all gather together, what do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we in a room? We should be in a room instead of in the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not downstairs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Upstairs, yeah. Convene in-room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's money and loot. Let's take a look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Convene in the girls' room. It's bound to be cleaner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did have a pillow fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's down feathers all over the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty (blows out lips).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we've got some stuff. What did we get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (heavy thud) Nott, what is this made out of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This? I will taste it. I will lick the safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very... iron-y? It's like licking a nine volt battery.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it made of lead?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's ironic. It's not what we want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really was trying to get a lead box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did very well considering it's after midnight and you got a metal box for free.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, can I tell it's lead-- I mean, iron, not lead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check. Because you are an alchemist, I'll give you advantage on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Just a straight intelligence check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Okay, yeah. This is very definitively iron. You've tasted iron, iron filings and things of that similar nature and it has the same twinge to the flavor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. It's a very well-made safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we can still put stuff in it if we want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Caleb? He downstairs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, where is Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's downstairs for now, but I am in constant communication with him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the last thing he said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take out my piece of wire and I do my incantation and I whisper to it and I say: Did the skeleton come to life and kill you? Please respond to this message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody is dead down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's good ol' Cay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's down there babysitting our item?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to want to take a look at these boots. These daggers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Claudia was aware that we guys were in league with the Knights of Requital.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Makes sense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Claudia says she's selling the tavern.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Like tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To a girl named Lauren Spizzick or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shpizich?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spinach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lauren Spinach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So she said she was selling it, and I said, "Wouldn't that draw attention to the tavern, "though?" and she said no, just her. But if it does, and she knows, then maybe it could lead the guards to us, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we change to a different hotel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might be smart, but that might be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, she was selling this place because of

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, so you guys recall, Horris is with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Horris came with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horris came along with you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my bad. Yeah, he did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we just sent him on his way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we forgot to qualify that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, fuck! I thought--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make believe is tricky, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Horris is in this room right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horris is in the room with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, come on, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should put on my pants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not be hasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, for the purposes of this, the door now opens to the room and Horris comes in after a drink to steady his nerves and goes, "Hello."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you bring me that drink? Oh, sit down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, jeez, man. No sense of humor right now, he's in shock, all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Horris, we're going to get you out of the city as soon as possible. Is there a destination you wanted to send him to, or point him in the right direction?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was mentioning Alfield, but really, it's up to him, I guess. I don't care.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have any spots in mind that you can lay low for a while?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why does he need to leave the city?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We walked in on him and his boy trying to skip town.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were understandably rattled. It's understandable, but Dolan's going to try and stay to make the city a better place. Horris is going to remove a bit of the risk for himself for a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just for a little bit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should go to the coast. You should get out of the empire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is lovely by the coast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he said he only wanted to be gone a week, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About a week or two, until things--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do you need to leave? Who's suspicious of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't know yet. It's just a precautionary measure."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do know that leaving town itself is suspicious in its own right, right? Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have an alibi, but if we both stay and we get found out, we both get arrested."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you have an alibi. It's hard to have an alibi when you mysteriously--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you want me to do, then?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't give a shit what you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She who questions everything and offers no answers. What do you want me to do?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think what Beau is trying to say is that you've made a wise choice in removing yourself for a bit. Did you happen to know the owner of The Leaky Tap? She's apparently selling it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Claudia. Also skipping town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't blame her, either."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if she's leaving town. She's just selling the tavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's selling it? Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She knew we were holding all those backroom meetings, right? She helps you guys quite a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as Dolan told me, yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want to get out of town tonight, or did you want to wait until the morning, perhaps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can wait until the morning, if you don't mind me crashing with you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not at all. We have room in Molly and I's room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can take Caleb and my room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why? Are you not going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be spending the night somewhere else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're not going to speak of that in mixed company, but they're dealing with other problems.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll lead Horris to our room and let him get comfortable. I'll be back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "It's probably a good idea." You're funny.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gravelly) Red rum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seriously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get to spend the night with that guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're going down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Anything else you want to work out, discuss, or plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's divvy up the loot. I've worked it out, that's 19 platinum apiece, and two gold pieces apiece.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, fucking pay day!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With two platinum left over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many platinum? 19?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot of platinum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And two gold?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take Caleb's share and give it to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so we also got-- let's look. This sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of sword is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's roughly longsword length. It has this curved, hooked edge to it. The blade looks like it would not just slash, but tear as it went through flesh as well. It's pretty wicked-looking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty wicked-looking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it look like it has any magical aura emanating from it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, can you sense magic?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not officially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you do not know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can take it downstairs later and have Cay-Cay take a look at it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cay-Cay, not to be confused with Kiki.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also have these really super cool spiky boots.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do those do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you put them on your feet and they protect them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, put those boots on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, all right. How do they look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they clash a bit, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think they go with your pants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, not really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get an extra spring in your step? What's it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment and you feel... alert.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're caffeinated. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't expect you to wear platforms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's weird to see the bottom of your pants because you normally have those thigh-highs on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, they're very comfortable and they keep everything else clean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Okay, we also have these three daggers, which look like-- Are they ceremonial? Do they look--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look functional. They're similar in design to the longsword. They're not quite as intricate, and they're much simpler. They don't have the same grooves carved into the hilt, and they look like fairly decent daggers for either stabbing or throwing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lick one, then I lick the safe. Is it iron, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not certain what material they're made from. It's not the same as the-- What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm playing with the longsword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's got a great balance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and we don't have the armor anymore, we gave it back to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the armor you gave back, and then was scooped up by the Crownsguard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Molly and I take out my bo staff. I say: Parry! and I go whack with the sword. See if anything happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you attack him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I told him I was attacking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to parry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 total.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boy, that hits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You attempt to parry cooly, and she hits you in the right eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sorry, I thought we were just wrestling a little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hit her with the flat of the blade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow! Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any effect?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I feel anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't I just have Caleb look--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any effect?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, a fucking headache!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, it works! It's amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take the daggers, unless you can use them to throw, I can throw them at things, I think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the daggers seem special?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure if they're special or not. I mean, the only person who can detect magic is not in the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to drag this out as long as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take one of the daggers and I throw it against the windowsill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Window-seal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's how they say it in Kentucky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Window-seal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seal. Damn it, that's true. What did you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Don't fuck me, Gil. 20. Sorry, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? Yeah. (vibrating impact) It sticks to the bottom of the sill; it doesn't quite hit the glass, it manages to hit its mark and stay there, like a dagger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, that was pretty awesome, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that was more you than the dagger, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are y'all staying in another place tonight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For safety.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Because of the thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (loudly) Yes, because of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horris isn't in the room anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You take your pants back off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, because of the thing. Caleb's idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need any help? Backup?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think what Fjord meant was: can y'all be trusted?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly. Will you send a message to Caleb and say, "Are we going to leave everyone else "tonight and steal the big ball?" Send a message to him saying that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very valid question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, sure. I take out my wire, I do my incantation. I send a Message to him, I say: Caleb, are we going to abscond with the dodecahedron in the dead of night? You can reply to this message, and only I can hear your reply.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell them I'm not going to run off with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, why? Why are you going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not going to steal it! He's scared of that thing, why would we take it away from you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like he's taken a few things that he's afraid of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, to be honest, that evening started to take a turn before the Richter showed up. Do you know Caleb to be sticky-fingered like yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do what we need to do to survive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what happened?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, remember we were trying to leave no trace? Caleb was the architect of the plan, and there was a scroll that looked like it might have some magic to it, and he wanted to take it with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So what? The plan was to

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do realize that missing things mean leaving a trace, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were right there at the end, we were at the finish line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We caused a giant explosion, we destroyed a rug, we broke into two different places, Mollymauk was seen by guards outside of both; there was plenty of traces we left behind. I opened a box that froze me for an hour!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, and I saved you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm pretty sure someone's going to notice that that box has been opened!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You realize you're not helping your case, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just saying, him taking a scroll is small potatoes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We’d already fucked up the rug, we probably shouldn't fuck up anyone else's house. We were already implicated at one place, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, it's just a little reckless, wouldn't you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What Caleb does is well thought-out and always intentional and smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a remarkable judge of character, you know that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you aware of what Stockholm Syndrome is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stockholm Syndrome?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm not. Explain that to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's an Emon thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gerald Stockholm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you implying?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think what Beau is trying to imply is-- I'm going to use something a little more basic. Do you know the story of the scorpion and the turtle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. The scorpion rides on the turtle's back...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then what happens?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The scorpion rides on the turtle's back across a river. The scorpion stings the turtle, they both drown. What is the moral of this story?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be a scorpion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay away from the water, is what I take from it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true, but the full point of this, and the point I'm trying to make, is that with a group like this with very untrustworthy people, you've got to trust each other-- because you have to trust somebody. You can't trust not anybody, because you're just alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so you are all apologizing for not trusting Caleb's judgment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't trust you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I trust you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've tried to steal from us twice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will support you in doing some ridiculous stuff, but you have to keep it outside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're looking out for you, I mean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that means sometimes you can't do the thing you want because it's going to be better for everybody else, and sometimes everybody else is wrong, but you have to go with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, and what exactly have you done to earn our trust?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing, there's been no earned trust--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saved you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually did take a crossbow bolt, knocked myself unconscious, trying to save your life!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not talking about life or death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I saved your life!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't matter, wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it doesn't matter, we start from scratch! This is where it starts!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've saved your lives, Caleb has saved your lives--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tonight. Caleb got that dodeca-fuckballs out of there by himself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We didn't want it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, hang on, before we turn this into a pissing contest--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has slain things, he has saved things, and I have as well! If we're talking about trust, what on earth have any of you people done to earn our trust? What have you done that we have requested? Ever?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I let you have a ring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you want to do something skeevey on the side, let me know, I will help you out. But when we are all working as a team, I don't want your actions to get me in fucking trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So if you really don't trust us, I'll happily take that 40 platinum back, right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't have to trust each other, but when we are working on a job together, I want to know that you care enough about yourself that you're not going to get me in trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, you're making me agree with her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When we signed up for this job, Caleb was very explicit. He said we are doing this for coin and treasure, and that's what we got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was no surprises here, we're in it for what we can grab for ourselves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're in it for what we can all grab together. That's how these things work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When you want to grab something for yourself, you let me know, and you go grab it for yourself, I don't have to be a part of it. When we choose one objective together, I can only trust that you are in it with us. We can be selfish as a group, and then be selfish as individuals.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why the circus worked. This is why the circus was functional.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, Nott, you count on Caleb to keep you safe, right, to achieve greater things than you by yourself can achieve. Think how many things you could do with all of us by your side. I'm not saying you don't have to be selfish, and I'm not saying that you can't go after treasure and coin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think there's a bit of a misconception here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my job to protect him, because I love him, and I am his protector. Not because he protects me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So do you think it would be a good idea to explain to him that he almost got himself killed tonight? Turning on a bunch of people he was working with, he almost got himself killed tonight for nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not the only one who can have the same interests in keeping each other safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you're not nearly as smart as you think you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I may, thank you for sharing that, Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so cute!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to be a great man someday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He will! He really will!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That changes things. I admit that I had the wrong idea about you two. I know what it's like to feel responsible for someone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, super shame that Caleb's not here for this entire conversation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I try not to have ideas about people, they just get in the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to go down there and hug him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you do, bring all of this stuff so he can actually do something useful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go down there, why don't we camp in the cellar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That seems like it would be suspicious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he created this situation, I'm all right with this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he know that you think of him like his son?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we get to tell him now, don't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we can't out her like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, we want to take care of Caleb, we do. We pulled him out of that house when that Fireball went off. We didn't cut and run, even though it might have saved our skins. We care about you two. I hope in time you'll learn to trust us just a little bit more. Maybe think about protecting us as well, because you seem to do a great job taking care of Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And stop expecting people to earn things. You just have to sometimes go with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll have a talk with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I appreciate that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, not as nice as what they said, if he ever does anything to get me fucking locked up I will beat him so fucking bad his ancestors on the next plane won't fucking recognize him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's very nice, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, I'm trying real hard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's progress.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, progress. I am an HR liability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about in the game?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So when are you planning to go down to keep an eye on your boy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As soon as you give me the stuff you want identified. And you'll have to trust me that we won't run away with it in the dead of night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, now I feel like you really will because everyone was just mean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We literally caught you stealing our stuff. Here's an extra platinum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you're the one who hypnotized me into talking about stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you think that's what friends do to each other?!

lines.name: TALIESIN

The general bustle is still happening.
